WorkItem.Description: With the sheer amount of new items, I set my filters to not show T9 Horde gear (I know, for the Horde! and all that, but still). However, the filters don't seem to work - I still see all the gear in the comparisons window.

Comments.Message: They rely on there being full data for those items, which there isn't yet. Wait for Wowhead to populate more data about those items.

To help with this, consider getting the Wowhead Client to contribute the data you naturally run across when playing.  You can set it to automatically run on system startup and automatically send its gathered data every time you close WoW, even.

Thanks, and I've been running the Wowhead Client for years. Sadly, it stopped working due to server issues on Wowhead's end almost two weeks ago. I've opened a thread on their forums about it, too. ;)

Let's look at those two items:

http://www.wowhead.com/?item=48592 (Horde)
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=48577 (Alliance)

Both are on Wowhead, both have been in the last two versions of Rawr. How would Rawr know, however, that the first one is a Horde only item? On Wowhead, there's no visible flag for Horde/Alliance only. Hmm.
It's expected that there will be.
